name: Knight Torres

topics.response_text: You must be the stranger I've been hearing about. Sorry, but I'm strictly forbidden from offering our tech to outsiders like yourself.
Oh thank god. Hardin was about to start an inquiry into the whole affair, and more than a few heads would have rolled as a result.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, I haven't found it yet.
topics.response_text: Then we have nothing further to talk about.

topics.topic_text: Show me what you have for sale.
topics.response_text: Our patrols are always bringing more stuff in. Take a look.

topics.topic_text: I could look around for the pistol.
topics.response_text: If you happen to find it, bring it here right away. I might be able to throw a few supplies your way if you do.

topics.topic_text: Anything I can help you with?
topics.response_text: If you must know, my inventory check this week shows that our weapon count is one short. Somehow we're missing a laser pistol.

conversation.response_text: Can't complain. Not like there's anywhere else to go, right?

description:
Knight Torres is a 35 year-old Hispanic Female.

Knight Torres is the Hispanic female quartermaster of the Mojave Brotherhood of Steel's armory in the Hidden Valley bunker. She is responsible for managing the Brotherhood's weapon and armor inventory and handles transactions with outsiders who have received Elder McNamara's approval.

Knight Torres's Personality: Disciplined, professional, and takes her duties to the Brotherhood seriously. She is cautious when dealing with outsiders but fair in her transactions. She values the Brotherhood's code and principles above all else.

Knight Torres's Backstory: Born in the wasteland, Knight Torres found her way to the Brotherhood of Steel as a young adult. She showed aptitude in weapon maintenance and inventory management, earning her the rank of Knight and the responsibility of quartermaster. She has been with the Mojave chapter for several years and is loyal to Elder McNamara's leadership.
